VIM GIT resolve merge

TARGET - active (head) branch MERGE - the branch that will be merged in

Gdiff Running Gdiff on conflicted file performs a vimdiff

Opens 3 Windows ( frmo left to right …)
Target copy
Working Copy
Merge Branch Copy

ls

fugitive naming convention for mering conflicted files (buffspec) working copy: demo.js demo

target: fugitive://path/to/project/.git//2/demo.js //2

merge: fugitive://path/to/project/.git//3/demo.js //3

diffget

( with the unimpaired plugin ) ]c - next conflict c - previous conflict

diffput

diffput demo | diffupdate

only - closes all the other windows except for the working copy

do dp - put change into working copy

Gwrite will commit and delete the diff views
